attributes.action: Require domestic gas and electric companies to provide an initial number of units of energy at a substantially reduced cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Require domestic gas and electric companies to provide an initial number of units of energy at a substantial discount, (also permitting them to charge more for the rest to make their business plans balance.)

In order to assist those in energy poverty and encourage reduction in energy use and more green housing.
